TestCase.Title: Test case TLS_B1_GP_07_T
TestCase.Purpose: This positive test evaluates the ability of the DUT to establish a TLS connection with valid parameters using named DHE groups and PFS. The test is carried out for the TLS version [TLS_VERSION], the PFS-cipher suite [CIPHERSUITE] and the domain parameters [GROUP].
TestCase.Precondition: DUT services are online without any known disturbances.
The DUT is accepting TLS connections.

Command.Text: The tester connects to the DUT.

TestStep.Description: The TLS ClientHello offers the TLS version [TLS_VERSION].
The TLS ClientHello offers only the cipher suite [CIPHERSUITE].
The TLS ClientHello offers the named groups extensions according to [GROUP].
The presence of the signature_algorithms extension depends on the used TLS version. In case it is sent, all algorithms that are supported according to the ICS are listed.
The TLS ClientHello does not contain further extensions which are not required to conduct the TLS handshake.

ExpectedResult.Text: The DUT accepts the TLS connection.
The TLS protocol is executed without errors and the channel is established.
The [GROUP] is used for the DHE key agreement.
